features: Airplane Toy: Spinning propellers, fold out landing gear, and boarding ladder teach young pilots the basics of airplanes and aviation!
Movable Parts: Cockpit window opens and closes to reveal a detailed control panel—set off on an airborne adventure!
Developmental Benefits: This toy plane is great for developing fine motor skills!
Planet-Friendly: This airplane toy is made of recyclable materials, and the packaging is 100% recyclable too!
Age Recommendation: This toy airplane is recommended for kids 1 year +.
body.description: Wheels up! Flying is just ‘plane’ fun with the Airplane from Wonder Wheels by Battat. Featuring spinning propellers and a fold-out boarding ladder, your little aviator soars like real fighter pilot! And, the Toy Airplane is made of recyclable materials! Like all good airplane toys for kids, the moveable landing gear folds in and out for a perfect takeoff and landing. This airplane toy encourages children to be adventurous and playful while developing fine motor skills and reducing screen time. Fasten your seatbelt—your next mission awaits!

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Wonder Wheels by Battat - get ready to roll! Colorful and rugged, Wonder Wheels toys by Battat teach toddlers about everyday vehicles while encouraging young minds to dream big! No matter the job--major construction projects, daring rescues, and exotic, far off adventures--exploring with Wonder Wheels delivers loads of fun. There’s no limit to where you can go! Wonder Wheels by Battat Toy Airplane 'Ground Control to Pilot: you're cleared for takeoff, have a nice flight!' Attention little pilots in training - your toy airplane has arrived! Fold down the ladder, spin the propellers, and climb up to the cockpit! Take it for a barrel-roll or try a thrilling nosedive. Then, unfold the landing gear for a perfect landing. The sky's the limit! Realistic details, including spinning propellers, fold out landing gear, and boarding ladder! Cockpit window opens and closes. Who will be your pilot? Measures 10.46 (L) x 11.39 (W) x 6.2 (H) inches. Made from recyclable plastic - where facilities exist For toddlers age 1 and up

Keep rolling in the right direction! Vehicles that get the job done right! Whether you're moving earth, digging deep underground, or making an amazing rescue in the nick of time, Wonder Wheels have got you covered! Got a farm to maintain, a fire to put out, or a family to ferry? The only limit is your imagination! Wonder Wheels even tow cars...but this time Mommy and Daddy won't get a parking ticket! Big learning through big adventure! Where do you want to go? How about a cruise on the highway with the top down and the wind in your hair? Pack your bags Wonder Wheels are great for developing fine motor skills and encouraging creativity while roll playing real life adventures. Soon, your little ones will pretend they're the boss! Get ready to roll! Wonder Wheels pass the 'toddler test.' The toys are as colorful as they are dependable and durable. We manufacture with your little one's safety in mind- no sharp edges so they're safe for little fingers, and made of safe plastics. After all, we know the car might drive off the road and into curious little mouths! Even better-the plastics are recyclable where facilities exist.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 18, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Pleased With Purchase!
reviews.reviewText: Purchased this plane for my son who is almost 3 years old and currently really into planes. I didn't realize when I ordered it that it had the folding landing gear, fold out ladder for the pilot and opening hatch for the pilot so those were all pleasant surprises and made me glad I picked this one over the green toys brand which is also a great brand btw, but their airplanes didn't have all this functionality. My son loves this plane and it seems to be made really well and the colors are very nice. I like that he can play with it inside or outside and I don't have to worry about it getting broken. Battat toys haven't let us down yet!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2020
reviews.reviewText: Bought this for an Easter gift for my 5yo whom loves his Daddy's vintage airplane toys that have wheels and cockpits with moving parts. He's VERY rough on toys and my husband's planes keep getting taken apart so I wanted something less vintage/special but just as cool. I almost bought the green toys airplane since we love their sturdiness, but I was afraid it might not hold his attention like the planes with more moving parts. I saw this one in the suggestions and I'm so glad I got this one instead!There are 3 movable propellers, wheels can be out up and down, the cockpit can be opened and shut, and there is even a little ladder that folds down from the wing. There is no pilot, and I kinda wish there was, however, my son found other small toys, like hatchimals, (and even candy) to put in the pilots seat, no problem, and for such an inexpensive yet fun and well-built toy, I don't care that it doesn't have a pilot at all.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 8, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Toy Plane Ever !
reviews.reviewText: Big, colorful, good texture. Won’t hurt your head if your kid throws it at you. Very well built. Perfect for budget and very high quality plastic. My toddler loves it. I want to buy one for myself, it’s that good toy you don’t throw away ever !

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars No small parts
reviews.reviewText: A Christmas gift for my 16 month old grandson. No small parts, I love that it is “chunky” perfect for small hands that like to explore. Quality and durability are spot on! Will be buying more of their products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy. A great brand!
reviews.reviewText: This plane has held up great over the past few months. We have many Battat toys and they are built to LAST. No issues at all for years with the others, and this one is no different.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2022
reviews.reviewText: It's a nice well made sturdy toy. My only complaint is there is no pilot. If your not going to have a figurine included then you should afix a pilot in the cockpit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Adorable well made.
reviews.reviewText: My 2.5 year old loves this. Well made for little hands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 26, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very sturdy, awesome toy
reviews.reviewText: My 2 yo son absolutely loves this plane. He is all boy, which means that he will plays hard and can be rough on his toys. We’ve had a Green Toys airplane for a year or so, which is a very sturdy, tough toy, and it’s still looking great and gets played with daily. My son just got this Battat plane today so I can’t speak to it’s longevity, but it seems to be just as sturdy as the Green Toys plane. A bonus is the wheels, steps, and cockpit door that go up & down, I am very happy with this purchase.
Me gustó mucho la marca, está bien hecho y su precio está muy atractivo
Nice toy airplane, perfect size for a little one. Good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on October 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: A lovely gift for our aeroplane mad grandson. Very sturdy and little figures can be placed in the cockpit.
Rekommenderar denna leksak. Man får ett positivt intryck över kvaliteten.... Toppen produkt!
Bien conçu pour un enfant de 3-4 ans. Bonne taille et de bonne qualité.
